message:
I think many of you have suffered a lot from integrating your login system with external services.
this video will show the upcoming support in ASP.NET that will let you add services like Facebook & Twitter login with ease (aka: the Microsoft way).

Enjoy :)
http://www.asp.net/vnext/overview/aspnet/oauth-in-the-default-aspnet-45-templates
name: OAuth in the Default ASP.NET 4.5 Templates : The Official Microsoft ASP.NET Site
caption: www.asp.net
description: By Scott Hanselman, My name is Scott Hanselman. I work out of my home office for Microsoft as a Principal Program Manager, aiming to spread good information about developing software, usually on the Microsoft stack.

data.message: P.S.: This is actually present not upcoming if I get it right
سكوت كان قال عنها من فتره
